* Make a new project folder
+
[source,js]
----
const fs = require('fs')
fs.mkdirSync('project')
----
* Initialize a new repository
+
[source,js]
----
const repo = { fs, dir: 'project' }
await git.init(repo)
----
* Create source files
+
We can't help you here.
This part you'll have to do on your own.
